name: ads
description: Complete paid advertising toolkit with 12 skills and 6 parallel audit subagents. Covers Google Ads (74 checks), Meta/Facebook (46 checks), LinkedIn B2B (25 checks), TikTok (25 checks), YouTube video ads, and Microsoft/Bing (20 checks). Includes cross-platform audit orchestration, budget allocation with 70/20/10 rule, creative fatigue detection, landing page optimization, strategic planning with 11 industry templates, and competitive intelligence via Ad Libraries.
